title: The Sage Who Transcended Samsara - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Mystery   Psychological   Supernatural   Xuanhuan
tags: Aristocracy   Buddhism   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Hiding True Identity   Late Romance   Male Protagonist   Multiple Realms   Nobles   Romantic Subplot   Secret Organizations   Survival   Transmigration   Unlimited Flow   Weak to Strong
author: Cuttlefish That Loves Diving   爱潜水的乌贼
description: Throughout this current life of mine, I will pay no attention to my past lives, nor will I seek future lives. I wish to live vigorously, to pay back debt of gratitude and fulfill duty to avenge, to defeat valiant heroes from all species, and to proudly laugh at all the Gods and Demons of the Six Path of Reincarnation!>
